prt_are02,153,144,4	script	Weapons#main	906,{
switch(select("Dagger:One-Handed Sword:Two-Handed Sword:Spear:Katar:Axe:Knuckle:Mace:Bow:Instrument:Whip:Rod&Stuff:Books:Guns:Ninjas")){
case 1:
	callshop "Dagger",1;
	break;
case 2:
	callshop "One-Handed Sword",1;
	break;
case 3:

	callshop "Two-Handed Sword",1;
	break;
case 4:

	callshop "Spear",1;
	break;
case 5:

	callshop "Katar",1;
	break;
case 6:

	callshop "Axe",1;
	break;
case 7:

	callshop "Knuckle",1;
	break;
case 8:

	callshop "Mace",1;
	break;
case 9:

	callshop "Bow",1;
	break;
case 10:

	callshop "Instrument",1;
	break;
case 11:

	callshop "Whip",1;
	break;
case 12:

	callshop "Rod&Stuff",1;
	break;
case 13:

	callshop "Books",1;
	break;
case 14:

	callshop "Gunslinger",1;
	break;
case 15:

	callshop "Ninja",1;
	break;
	}
}
